title: I’m the Boss Who Modified the World - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Comedy   Fantasy   Martial Arts   Sci-fi   Xianxia
tags: Aliens   Appearance Changes   Artificial Intelligence   Beast Companions   Beasts   Calm Protagonist   Clones   Cultivation   Divination   Dragons   Evil Gods   Evil Religions   Fairies   Fantasy World   Fast Cultivation   Game Elements   Game Ranking System   Ghosts   God Protagonist   Godly Powers   Gods   Hiding True Abilities   Hiding True Identity   Leadership   Magic   Magic Beasts   Male Protagonist   Modern Day   Monsters   Multiple Identities   Multiple Reincarnated Individuals   Mystery Solving   Politics   Possession   Protagonist with Multiple Bodies   Racism   Samurai   Saving the World   Secret Identity   Secret Organizations   Secretive Protagonist   Souls   Time Skip   Virtual Reality
author: Little Dream   小梦
description:
Hu Feng, a high school student, accidentally embarked on the road of modifying the world.

He connected a mobile game with reality, allowing ghosts to appear in real life…

He became a martial art master, climbing out from the grave.

He endowed plants and animals with artificial intelligence.

He even became the leader of Non-human Asian Rebels.

He devoted himself to build up virtual reality, created new mythologies and constructed a spectacular world.>
